title: "Machine Learning in the Tidyverse"
output: html_notebook

```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(gapminder)
```

```{r}
# Explore gapminder
head(gapminder)

# Prepare the nested dataframe gap_nested
library(tidyverse)
gap_nested <- gapminder %>% 
  group_by(country) %>% 
  nest()

# Explore gap_nested
head(gap_nested)
```
